effect: Lowers the Defense stat of all other Pokémon on the field by 25%.
synergies: Physical attackers on the user's team
Pokémon with moves that bypass or benefit from lowered Defense (e.g., Fissure, False Swipe for catching)
Entry hazards like Stealth Rock to capitalize on weakened defenses
notes: One of the 'Ruination' abilities introduced in Generation IX. It affects all Pokémon except the ability holder, including allies. Does not stack with identical abilities.
